meanings.definition: The state or quality of being withdrawn or reserved.
meanings.sent1: Her withdrawnnesses made it hard for others to get to know her.
meanings.sent2: His withdrawnnesses in class often made him seem unapproachable.
meanings.sent3: Despite her withdrawnnesses, she still had a warm smile for everyone.
meanings.sent4: The artist's withdrawnnesses added an air of mystery to his work.
meanings.sent5: The withdrawnnesses of the forest at night gave it an eerie feel.

meanings.definition: The act of removing or taking back something.
meanings.sent1: The withdrawnnesses of the offer surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: After the withdrawnnesses of the permission, he had to find another way.
meanings.sent3: The withdrawnnesses of the gift left her feeling disappointed.
meanings.sent4: His withdrawnnesses of the promise caused tension in their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The withdrawnnesses of the prize left the contestants in disbelief.

meanings.definition: The tendency to avoid social interaction or communication.
meanings.sent1: His withdrawnnesses at the party were noticeable to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She struggled with her withdrawnnesses in large social gatherings.
meanings.sent3: Despite his withdrawnnesses, he managed to make a new friend.
meanings.sent4: The withdrawnnesses of the shy student were misunderstood by his classmates.
meanings.sent5: The withdrawnnesses of the cat made it hide whenever guests came over.
